title: Tatra For Sale - BaT Auctions
text: 1973 Tatra 2-603 II This 1973 Tatra 2-603 II was built in Kopřivnice, Czechoslovakia, and comes from the third and final series of the model. The car is finished in white over two-tone black and red upholstery, and power comes from a rear-mounted, air-cooled 2.5L V8 paired with a column-shifted four-speed manual transaxle. Bid: EUR €16,000
